sentences.en: A term given to viewers who are unselective about the content they watch.
sentences.cn: 指那些对所收看的节目内容不加选择的观众。

sentences.en: But, in fact, there are selective and unselective ways to implement the safeguards.
sentences.cn: 但在贸易实践中, 保障措施的实施往往存在选择性和非选择性两种方式.

trans.tran_cn: 没有选择性的，没有选择力的，不加区别的
